name: CVE-2021-44077 POC Default Dropped File
description: Detects the creation of "msiexec.exe" in the "bin" directory of the ManageEngine SupportCenter Plus (Related to CVE-2021-44077) and public POC available (See references section)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`file.path:*\\ManageEngine\\SupportCenterPlus\\bin\\msiexec.exe`
